import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import Menus from './Menus' import "./index.css" import { Filter } from '@material-ui/icons' function Gallery() { const [items, setItems] = useState(Menus) return ( <>

order your favourite dish

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipi sicing elit. Possimus voluptates.

Price : {price}

{description}

) }) }
) } export default Gallery
